attributes.action: Help for people with complex eyes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition relates to having extremly poor eyesight and have to have complex lenses as im sure im not the only one who receives the shameful £13 pounds NHS voucher off the lens that cost £150.

I get the £13 off because off a complex lens. Please sign this petition as we all know people who were glasses


I would like to see more a personal return for my money as a paying tax payer.
